_header: If the blind will have his boon
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; Virgin Mary, attributes of; sermons, verse in
_description: Christ and Mary, the sun and moon — two couplets in a Latin sermon

CULIi38.Transcription:
Yif þe blynde wile haue is boneCrist is þe sunne and marie
                    þe moneÞe sunne þe monespredeȝ here lithÞe
                    sunne by daye þe mone by nyth

Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.”

         33 (1971): 63-84: 71.
